caption:
📸 : @idealbridalaz 

Here are some HOT tips for hair that “doesn’t hold a curl” 👇🏼

Spray with hairspray FIRST and brush through - always use heat protection too✨ Aquage Working spray is perfect for this. 

CURL with a flat-iron (or wand) instead of a traditional curling iron (depending on desired style and hair type). A flat iron can allow more even heat distribution while smoothing at the same time.

Wait until the last minute to brush out and use a wide-toothed comb and move slowly while reinforcing with a working spray. 

Finish with a high-hold hairspray 8-10 inches away from the hair (this will help with even distribution of product) ✨

Save and Follow me for tips and inspo 🥰

#longhairstyles #flatironcurls #hairtipsdaily #weddinghairideas #2024bride #2024brides #bridalhairstyles #bohobrides
